blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: The Thunder and the Storm
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2rRyjxA

by lando_cal_rice_ian

thor and storm go on a date

Words: 1633, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), X-Men - All Media Types, Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, Other
  • Characters: Thor (Marvel), Ororo Munroe | Bloodstorm, Ororo Munroe, Tony Stark, Charles Xavier, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Peter Parker, Ellie Phimister, Frigga | Freyja (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Thor/Storm, Storm/Thor, Ororo Munroe/Thor, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Charles Xavier
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, thor is a dork, but i too would be dumb around someone so amazing as ororo, also papa tony makes a cameo

blog.name: shanastoryteller
blog.title: ShanaStoryteller
blog.description: Shana | 24 | Bi | Cis Lady | Atheist | California l Buy Gods & Monsters Buy Me a Coffee Me On AO3 Fandom Fic Gods&Monsters Retold Fairytales Haiku Project

summary: Happy holidays! Something with the Avengers?
question: Happy holidays! Something with the Avengers?
answer:
Tony hates sleeping alone. He used to crawl into bed with Jarvis as a kid, then Rhodey in college, then a string of one night stands, because an unfamiliar person in his bed was better than no person in his bed. 

He never asked Pepper, because he is actually aware that there are lines he shouldn’t cross, but sometimes she’s slide in with him anyway. 

The rest of the avengers pick up on it, and sometimes one of them will just show up in his bedroom. He’s not sure if they don’t want to be alone, or they don’t him to be alone, but he’s too embarrassed to ask, so he just goes with it.

blog.name: themarvelouswhale
blog.title: Loki is the owner of my heart♥️
blog.description: Marvel Scenarios | Feel free to send in your requests! | Masterlist

body:
Merry Christmas

Avengers + Reader

This was the first ever Christmas that you were going to spend with the Avengers and you were extremely excited to spend your holidays with the people you loved most.

The entire tower was decked out with Christmas lights and many other Christmas decorations by courtesy of the one and only Tony Stark.

However, the common room was still rather empty but none of you had the time to do anything to make the room look prepared for Christmas.

-

It was the morning of Christmas and you entered the common room to see almost everyone busy finishing up the decorations.

Everyone has been so busy with missions, today was the only time that all of you could do this.

As you were looking around, trying to think about what to do, an aroma brought your attention to the kitchen.

You looked into the kitchen to see Wanda and Vision preparing some food. When they spotted you, Wanda offered, “(Y/n)! Want to try what we made?” You nodded as Vision handed you a sample.

Before you took a bite, you joked, “I won’t die from this, right?” As you looked at Vision. The android gulped nervously, “I certainly hope not.” You laughed, “I’m just joking, Vision.”

When you tried the food, your taste buds felt blessed. “This is amazing!” You complimented with widened eyes. Wanda and Vision looked at you with grins on their faces, relieved and proud of their work. Vision stated, “Wanda did do most of the work.” You noticed Wanda’s cheeks started to grow pink and you couldn’t help but smile at the couple.

-

Shortly after, you exited the kitchen to see Steve enter the room while carrying a huge Christmas tree over his shoulder. Behind him, Bucky and Sam were carrying boxes of Christmas decorations.

Steve placed the tree in the corner of the room and you made your way there to see if they needed any help.

“Hey guys, need any help?” You asked cheerfully. Bucky smiled, “You can help us hang the Christmas ornaments on the tree.” You nodded as Sam opened a box that was filled with ornaments. 

The four of you started hanging the ornaments on the tree while stories and jokes were being shared. When you wanted to put the star at the top of the tree, you realised that you were way too short. You still couldn’t reach the top when you tip-toed. 

Upon noticing this, Steve lifted you up and placed you on his shoulder gently. When he did so, you let out a yelp in surprise. However, this allowed you to place the star on the tip of the tree. 

After Steve placed you back on the ground gently, you looked at the tree and you were already starting to get the Christmas vibe of the room as you inhaled the smell of pine from the tree.

After you were done, Steve said, “(Y/n), will you please bring this box to Peter?” As he handed you an unopened box. You nodded in agreement as you saw Peter inside the kitchen. 

-

You brought the box to Peter and said, “Hey Peter, Cap told me to pass this box to you.” Peter smiled widely as he took the box from you and opened it, revealing Christmas lights. “Thank you so much!” Peter grinned but suddenly, he smile faltered. 

“What’s wrong?” You questioned. Peter pouted, “I can’t hang all of these lights alone.” You couldn’t help but laugh slightly at Peter’s adorableness and you offered, “Do you want some help?” Peter’s face brightened once more, “Really?! You’ll help me?” You nodded at the male and he started cheering.

Peter skipped out of the kitchen and you followed. The both of you started hanging the lights all around the room but none of you were sure how it would look. Yours’ and Peter’s laughter filled the entire room as you and Peter took turns to wrap each other with the lights, instead of hanging them.

When you finished, you and Peter took a step back to admire your work. “We did amazing!” Peter said in astonishment. You replied, “Yeah.” You were honestly quite surprised by how well the end product turned out as you and Peter were just playing around.

-

Peter thanked you once more and the boh of you turned around to see Bruce, Natasha, and Clint sitting by the Christmas tree, placing the presents under the tree.

You and Peter made your way to the three of them and Clint immediately noticed the both of you. “Hey guys, come and help us! We have a lot of gifts here.” You sat down and Peter followed after, you then noticed the tall and large stack of gifts at the side. You gasped, remembering that you were so busy, you completely forgot about getting presents.

Natasha heard your gasp and she smiled, “There are enough presents from everyone. Don’t worry, most of us didn’t get the time to buy Christmas presents either.” You heaved a sigh of relief at her words and you made a mental note to remind yourself to get gifts next year.

You spent a few minutes talking to all of them when Bruce pointed out, “Tony’s quite lonely.” All of you looked at where Bruce was looking at to see Tony standing by the bar, mixing some drinks. 

-

You decided to get up and made your way to accompany Tony. You stood beside the billionaire and asked, “Is there any alcohol in there?” Tony chuckled, “Unfortunately no, we have kids here.” He looked up to the group by the Christmas tree and you knew that he was talking about Peter since he was still rather childish.

The both of you started talking about how each of you used the celebrate Christmas, you actually learnt quite a few things about Tony since you had never really gotten a lot of chances to talk to him, much less know more about him.

Suddenly, you heard a bang from the level above you. Tony sighed, “It’s from the library, (Y/n), can you go check what is going?”

Without saying anything, you made your way to the library, curious as to what made that noise.

-

You entered the room and saw Loki facepalming and Thor was staring at the pile of books on the floor. Loki sighed, “Brother, you can’t just do that.” 

You took a few steps towards them and asked, “What happened?” Thor shot his head up at the sound of your voice and explained, “I apologise, (Y/n), we was just trying to read up on Christmas traditions since we don’t really know much about them despite being on Midgard for a while now.” 

You smiled at Thor’s interest in the holiday and you said, “I don’t think there are any books about Christmas here, but I don’t mind sharing more about the holidays.” Loki smiled slightly, “That would be lovely, thank you, (Y/n).”

For the rest of the afternoon, you were in the library telling Thor and Loki stories about Christmas and the traditions. The Asgardians just sat still and listened to you attentively, which was a rare sight to see them so quiet.

-

That night, all of you were sitting at the dining table with the food that Wanda and Vision prepared and the drinks that Tony made. Rhodey had just arrived for dinner since he was busy during the day but you were glad he made it, nevertheless. 

You had been enjoying the day so far since you spent it with the Avengers. It gave you the opportunity to get to know the members a little more, and it was quite rare to have everyone at the dining table, eating peacefully together and not after a mission.

While having a conversation with some of the Avengers, you looked the chance to around the room. The entire room was brightly lit with multi-coloured lights. The big Christmas tree also helped to light up the room and there were gifts at the bottom of the tree that has yet to be opened.

It warmed your heart to see everyone doing well and alive. Most importantly, they were all enjoying their time together. You hoped for more moments like this in the future.

As everyone was enjoying the food, Tony stood up abruptly, scaring you. Tony smiled genuinely, “I just want to say that it has been a good year with you guys, and I am thankful for every single one of you. Cheers to a better 2019!” 

For a moment, you suspected someone had drugged Tony’s drink since you had never heard him say such things but you weren’t complaining.

All of you stood up while raising your glasses and clinking them with one another. Everyone yelled out in unison, “Merry Christmas!” 

You were extremely grateful to have joined this family. You couldn’t ask for anything better.

Merry Christmas, everyone!

While having a conversation with some of the Avengers, you looked the chance to around the room. The entire room was brightly lit with multi-coloured lights. The big Christmas tree also helped to light up the room and there were gifts at the bottom of the tree that has yet to be opened.

It warmed your heart to see everyone doing well and alive. Most importantly, they were all enjoying their time together. You hoped for more moments like this in the future.

As everyone was enjoying the food, Tony stood up abruptly, scaring you. Tony smiled genuinely, “I just want to say that it has been a good year with you guys, and I am thankful for every single one of you. Cheers to a better 2019!” 

For a moment, you suspected someone had drugged Tony’s drink since you had never heard him say such things but you weren’t complaining.

All of you stood up while raising your glasses and clinking them with one another. Everyone yelled out in unison, “Merry Christmas!” 

You were extremely grateful to have joined this family. You couldn’t ask for anything better.

Merry Christmas, everyone!
trail.content:
Merry Christmas

Avengers + Reader

This was the first ever Christmas that you were going to spend with the Avengers and you were extremely excited to spend your holidays with the people you loved most.

The entire tower was decked out with Christmas lights and many other Christmas decorations by courtesy of the one and only Tony Stark.

However, the common room was still rather empty but none of you had the time to do anything to make the room look prepared for Christmas.

-

It was the morning of Christmas and you entered the common room to see almost everyone busy finishing up the decorations.

Everyone has been so busy with missions, today was the only time that all of you could do this.

As you were looking around, trying to think about what to do, an aroma brought your attention to the kitchen.

You looked into the kitchen to see Wanda and Vision preparing some food. When they spotted you, Wanda offered, “(Y/n)! Want to try what we made?” You nodded as Vision handed you a sample.

Before you took a bite, you joked, “I won’t die from this, right?” As you looked at Vision. The android gulped nervously, “I certainly hope not.” You laughed, “I’m just joking, Vision.”

When you tried the food, your taste buds felt blessed. “This is amazing!” You complimented with widened eyes. Wanda and Vision looked at you with grins on their faces, relieved and proud of their work. Vision stated, “Wanda did do most of the work.” You noticed Wanda’s cheeks started to grow pink and you couldn’t help but smile at the couple.

-

Shortly after, you exited the kitchen to see Steve enter the room while carrying a huge Christmas tree over his shoulder. Behind him, Bucky and Sam were carrying boxes of Christmas decorations.

Steve placed the tree in the corner of the room and you made your way there to see if they needed any help.

“Hey guys, need any help?” You asked cheerfully. Bucky smiled, “You can help us hang the Christmas ornaments on the tree.” You nodded as Sam opened a box that was filled with ornaments. 

The four of you started hanging the ornaments on the tree while stories and jokes were being shared. When you wanted to put the star at the top of the tree, you realised that you were way too short. You still couldn’t reach the top when you tip-toed. 

Upon noticing this, Steve lifted you up and placed you on his shoulder gently. When he did so, you let out a yelp in surprise. However, this allowed you to place the star on the tip of the tree. 

After Steve placed you back on the ground gently, you looked at the tree and you were already starting to get the Christmas vibe of the room as you inhaled the smell of pine from the tree.

After you were done, Steve said, “(Y/n), will you please bring this box to Peter?” As he handed you an unopened box. You nodded in agreement as you saw Peter inside the kitchen. 

-

You brought the box to Peter and said, “Hey Peter, Cap told me to pass this box to you.” Peter smiled widely as he took the box from you and opened it, revealing Christmas lights. “Thank you so much!” Peter grinned but suddenly, he smile faltered. 

“What’s wrong?” You questioned. Peter pouted, “I can’t hang all of these lights alone.” You couldn’t help but laugh slightly at Peter’s adorableness and you offered, “Do you want some help?” Peter’s face brightened once more, “Really?! You’ll help me?” You nodded at the male and he started cheering.

Peter skipped out of the kitchen and you followed. The both of you started hanging the lights all around the room but none of you were sure how it would look. Yours’ and Peter’s laughter filled the entire room as you and Peter took turns to wrap each other with the lights, instead of hanging them.

When you finished, you and Peter took a step back to admire your work. “We did amazing!” Peter said in astonishment. You replied, “Yeah.” You were honestly quite surprised by how well the end product turned out as you and Peter were just playing around.

-

Peter thanked you once more and the boh of you turned around to see Bruce, Natasha, and Clint sitting by the Christmas tree, placing the presents under the tree.

You and Peter made your way to the three of them and Clint immediately noticed the both of you. “Hey guys, come and help us! We have a lot of gifts here.” You sat down and Peter followed after, you then noticed the tall and large stack of gifts at the side. You gasped, remembering that you were so busy, you completely forgot about getting presents.

Natasha heard your gasp and she smiled, “There are enough presents from everyone. Don’t worry, most of us didn’t get the time to buy Christmas presents either.” You heaved a sigh of relief at her words and you made a mental note to remind yourself to get gifts next year.

You spent a few minutes talking to all of them when Bruce pointed out, “Tony’s quite lonely.” All of you looked at where Bruce was looking at to see Tony standing by the bar, mixing some drinks. 

-

You decided to get up and made your way to accompany Tony. You stood beside the billionaire and asked, “Is there any alcohol in there?” Tony chuckled, “Unfortunately no, we have kids here.” He looked up to the group by the Christmas tree and you knew that he was talking about Peter since he was still rather childish.

The both of you started talking about how each of you used the celebrate Christmas, you actually learnt quite a few things about Tony since you had never really gotten a lot of chances to talk to him, much less know more about him.

Suddenly, you heard a bang from the level above you. Tony sighed, “It’s from the library, (Y/n), can you go check what is going?”

Without saying anything, you made your way to the library, curious as to what made that noise.

-

You entered the room and saw Loki facepalming and Thor was staring at the pile of books on the floor. Loki sighed, “Brother, you can’t just do that.” 

You took a few steps towards them and asked, “What happened?” Thor shot his head up at the sound of your voice and explained, “I apologise, (Y/n), we was just trying to read up on Christmas traditions since we don’t really know much about them despite being on Midgard for a while now.” 

You smiled at Thor’s interest in the holiday and you said, “I don’t think there are any books about Christmas here, but I don’t mind sharing more about the holidays.” Loki smiled slightly, “That would be lovely, thank you, (Y/n).”

For the rest of the afternoon, you were in the library telling Thor and Loki stories about Christmas and the traditions. The Asgardians just sat still and listened to you attentively, which was a rare sight to see them so quiet.

-

That night, all of you were sitting at the dining table with the food that Wanda and Vision prepared and the drinks that Tony made. Rhodey had just arrived for dinner since he was busy during the day but you were glad he made it, nevertheless. 

You had been enjoying the day so far since you spent it with the Avengers. It gave you the opportunity to get to know the members a little more, and it was quite rare to have everyone at the dining table, eating peacefully together and not after a mission.

While having a conversation with some of the Avengers, you looked the chance to around the room. The entire room was brightly lit with multi-coloured lights. The big Christmas tree also helped to light up the room and there were gifts at the bottom of the tree that has yet to be opened.

It warmed your heart to see everyone doing well and alive. Most importantly, they were all enjoying their time together. You hoped for more moments like this in the future.

As everyone was enjoying the food, Tony stood up abruptly, scaring you. Tony smiled genuinely, “I just want to say that it has been a good year with you guys, and I am thankful for every single one of you. Cheers to a better 2019!” 

For a moment, you suspected someone had drugged Tony’s drink since you had never heard him say such things but you weren’t complaining.

All of you stood up while raising your glasses and clinking them with one another. Everyone yelled out in unison, “Merry Christmas!” 

You were extremely grateful to have joined this family. You couldn’t ask for anything better.

Merry Christmas, everyone!

summary:
Summary: Ronnie gives Wanda a piece of her mind.
Pairings: Platonic!Wanda Maximoff x OFC
Other Characters: Steve Rogers
Word...
body:
Forgiveness

Summary: Ronnie gives Wanda a piece of her mind.

Pairings: Platonic!Wanda Maximoff x OFC

Other Characters: Steve Rogers

Word Count: 681

Warnings: Angst, I guess?

A/N: Remember in my backstory I said that Ronnie blamed Wanda for Bruce’s decision to leave? Well, here it is, in fic form! Also, this contains my other OC, Rosalia Sharp, but only for a brief moment. I already set up her Tumblr page, but it’s empty right now. If I don’t get too lazy uninspired, I’ll do her basic info page as soon as I can.

(GIF by @bairose)

The New Avengers had just finished their training session, and everyone was resting. Ronnie was sitting inside the facility, thinking about her father. It had been a few days since he decided to leave the others behind in fear of hurting them. She closed her eyes and remembered the last thing she said to him…

“Hey Papa. We did it; the job’s finished,” Ronnie told Hulk. She was on the Helicarrier while he was on a Quinjet he stole from Ultron.

“Now I need you to turn this bird around, okay?” Ronnie continued. “We can’t track you in stealth mode, so help me out. I need you t—” Ronnie didn’t even get a chance to finish her sentence as Hulk sadly ended the call. Ronnie stood in shock for a brief moment before she felt a hand on her shoulder; it was Rosalia.

“I’m sorry, Ronnie,” she apologized. “It’s going to be okay—”

“No. No, you don’t understand,” Ronnie interrupted. “It’s not going to be okay. I just lost my father for the second time in my life! It’s not going to be okay! NOTHING IS OKAY ANYMORE!” Ronnie took a couple of steps back before collapsing to her knees and clutching her head in pain.

The last thought in her head before she blacked out was her father’s sad looking face before he cut communications.

Tears streamed down Ronnie’s face as she kept replaying the moment in her head over and over.

“Are you okay?” a concerned voice asked. Ronnie looked up and saw Steve.

“Um, y-yes… I think so,” Ronnie replied.

“Are you thinking about your dad again?”

“…Yeah.”

Ronnie suddenly remembered Wanda, the woman who started all of the problems in the first place. Wanda had tampered with everyone’s minds, including Bruce’s. This caused him to hulk out and go on a rampage in Johannesburg. He was distraught when he came back, calling himself a monster. If it weren’t for Wanda, then Bruce would most likely still be here!

“Um, Steve, do you know where I can find Wanda?” Ronnie asked.

“Yeah, she’s down the hall, take a right, second door on the left,” Steve responded. “Why? Is there something wrong?”

“No, I just want to… talk to her.”

“Wanda.” Ronnie’s voice was low, almost monotone.

“You’re the Banner girl, aren’t you?” Wanda asked.

“Yeah,” Ronnie responded in the same tone as before. “My dad’s gone because of you.”

“What are you talking about?”

“He left everyone behind because he didn’t want to hurt anyone else after his incident in Johannesburg. Which, by the way, only happened because you decided to play with our minds! If it weren’t for your mind-scrambling magic, daddy would still be here!” Ronnie grabbed Wanda by her shirt and pinned her against the nearest wall.

“Give me one good reason why I shouldn’t kill you right now,” Ronnie growled, her eyes slowly turning green.

“G-go ahead,” Wanda sighed. “I’ll be able to reunite with my brother.” Ronnie dropped Wanda in shock, the former’s eyes reverting back to their original color.

“Wait, what? Your brother… died?”

Wanda nodded, looking solemn. “He got shot while protecting a boy and your friend Clint,” she explained.

Ronnie fell to the ground as tears formed in her eyes. Wanda was dealing with the loss of a loved one as well, and she must be devastated. If only she had someone to comfort her…

“Oh my God… I’m sorry… I’m so sorry,” Ronnie apologized. “I had no idea…” She let the tears flow freely. After a few moments, she felt Wanda’s comforting hand on her shoulder.

“I should probably apologize, too,” the Sokovian confessed. “I know I can’t take back my actions, but I can try and make sure they don’t happen again. I hope you can forgive me.”

Ronnie looked up at Wanda and smiled slightly.

“You know what? Yeah, I think I can forgive you. As long as you can forgive me. In fact, do you want to start over from the beginning? I’ll go first. Hello, my name is Ronnie Banner.”

“…I’m Wanda Maximoff.”

summary: 3 Things that Marvel could do with 'Ant-Man 3'
title: 3 Things that Marvel could do with 'Ant-Man 3'
excerpt: Ant-Man 3 'is still an unknown on the horizon of Marvel, but here are 3 possible things that the study could do with it. After the events of 'Ant-Man and the Wasp' and what happened at the end of 'Avengers: Infinity War', what is at stake in Marvel Studios is great. The twentieth movie of the superhero franchise ended in a similarly heartbreaking terrain, with Hope van Dyne, Hank Pym and Janet van Dyne perishing after the crack of Thanos and with Scott Lang being trapped and deadlocked in the Quantum Kingdom. Thus, Ant Man will play a key role in 'Avengers 4' and may have an important future in Phase 4 of the MCU. Therefore, through Fandom Wikia, we talked about what could happen in a potential 'Ant-Man 3'. 1. The wedding between the Ant Man and the Wasp Who does not love a happy ending? Optimism has been lost in the Marvel Studios movies over time. There have been ruptures, planets destroyed and beloved characters who have been forced to disappear. Tony Stark and Pepper Potts are

Peter: *flatlines*

Tony: *INTENSE PARENTAL PANICKING*

May: *Takes off her sunglasses* Peter Benjamin Parker, if you die, I will ground you for a month. No Ned, no MJ, no Tony-

Tony: *Whimpers*

May: And absolutely no Avengers business.

Peter: AuNt MaY, i’M sO sOrRy.

Peter: AuNt MaY, i’M sO sOrRy.

summary: Avengers 4: Deadpool Joins The Tape And Looks Like an Avenger in Trailer
title: Avengers 4: Deadpool Joins The Tape And Looks Like an Avenger in Trailer
excerpt: A few Days after the premiere of Avengers 4, a fan modified the trailer and surprised everyone by revealing what the film would look like if Deadpool were included. Avengers: Endgame has the fans of Marvel anguished by having to wait a couple of months to learn what will happen to their favorite superheroes. In the midst of uncertainty, a YouTube user decided to make some minor modifications to the first Avengers trailer: Endgame and included the popular Deadpool on the tape. As an avenger, the character that gives life Ryan Reynolds steals the roles of Ironman, Black Widow and Captain America, to show that he is still in search of his beloved Wolverine. In the video entitled 'Everyone is Ryan Reynolds', Deadpool puts himself in the shoes of all the characters that appear in Avengers and steals their dialogues. But the creator of this parody has not settled for that, it has changed conversations and also included some personal touch and a

summary: Vision will face Thanos in the final battle of Avengers 4 with a new body
title: Vision will face Thanos in the final battle of Avengers 4 with a new body
excerpt: Marvel would revive Vision in Avengers 4 Endgame, even though he was killed by Thanos in Infinity War to be stripped of his infinity gem. Avengers 4 Endgame is the most anticipated Marvel film for 2019, which will put an end to the speculations generated in Infinity War and reveal the names of the superheroes who will fall in the final battle against Thanos, since despite many of them They disappeared with the guantalete, they would return thanks to a last resort of their companions. As it is remembered, the final battle against Thanos in Infinity War left half of the universe annihilated after the defeat of the Avengers, in addition many members of the team finished vanished in the battlefield; However, two of them were defeated before the Snap Gamora and Vision. Vision ended up falling in the final fight for the gem of the mind at the hands of the Scarlet Witch, who used her powers against with the intention of finishing off the gem before Thanos took her position. However, the crazy

body:
First Look At Marvel Action: Avengers #1

Matthew K. Manning (A/CA) Jon Sommariva

A new era of all out Avengers action begins! A new team is formed to battle a mega-sized threat that is weider and wilder than any of the superheroes have met before! This new ongoing series will be the perfect opportunity for middle grade readers, and fans of all ages, to experience the thrilling adventures of Avengers comics for the first time!

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Now the Time is Here
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Rj2axm

by NyxEtoile, OlivesAwl

“My name is Dr. Steven Strange, and I need your help.”

Tony tilted his head. “No, but really, who are you.”

Sharon shushed him. “That’s his name.”

“I’m from the future, and I need your help to save the world. I come from a future where a madman has wielded immense cosmic power, and used it to wipe out half of all life in the universe.”

"How can we fix that from here?”

“You actually can’t. You need to fix it about five years ago. If you try now, it will be too late.”

"We’ll do it,” Steve said. “Just let us suit up-“

“Not how it works,” Strange said. “Good luck.”

Words: 2594, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Tales Through the Looking Glass

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Avengers Team (MCU), Amanda Newbury, Original Characters, Stephen Strange
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Sharon Carter/Steve Rogers, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Jane Foster/Thor, Darcy Lewis/Original Male Character(s), James "Bucky” Barnes/Original Female Character(s), Bruce Banner/Original Female Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Time Travel, AU of an AU, Team as Family, Magic, Fixing Past Mistakes, Deja Vu


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Rj2axm
